movie.title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
movie.plot: Eccentric candy man Willy Wonka prompts a worldwide frenzy when he announces that golden tickets hidden inside five of his delicious candy bars will admit their lucky holders into his top-secret confectionary. But does Wonka have an agenda hidden amid a world of Oompa Loompas and chocolate rivers?
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 2 nominations.
